properties.entry: SELECT (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM PAYMENT WHERE PAYMENT_DATE BETWEEN TO_DATE(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND TO_DATE(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND PAYMENT_CANCEL IS NULL AND PAYMENT_STATUS_CODE = 1) AS COUNT_CONFIRM, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM PAYMENT WHERE PAYMENT_DATE BETWEEN TO_DATE(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND TO_DATE(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND PAYMENT_CANCEL IS NOT NULL AND PAYMENT_STATUS_CODE = 1) AS COUNT_CANCEL FROM DUAL

SELECT (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM PAYMENT WHERE PAYMENT_DATE BETWEEN TO_DATE(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND TO_DATE(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND PAYMENT_CANCEL IS NULL AND PAYMENT_STATUS_CODE = 1) AS COUNT_CONFIRM, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM PAYMENT WHERE PAYMENT_DATE BETWEEN TO_DATE(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND TO_DATE(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND PAYMENT_CANCEL IS NOT NULL AND PAYMENT_STATUS_CODE = 1) AS COUNT_CANCEL FROM DUAL

SELECT (SUM(DECODE(ROOM_TYPE, 'A', 80000, 'B', 120000, 80000) * RESERVATION_STAY_DATE)) AS INCOME FROM RESERVATION LEFT JOIN PAYMENT ON (RESERVATION_NO=PAYMENT_RESERVATION_NO) LEFT JOIN ROOM ON (RESERVATION.ROOM_NO=ROOM.ROOM_NO) WHERE PAYMENT_STATUS_CODE = 1 AND PAYMENT_CANCEL IS NULL AND PAYMENT_DATE BETWEEN TO_DATE(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND TO_DATE(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD')
SELECT (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ROOM WHERE ROOM_TYPE='A') AS A, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ROOM WHERE ROOM_TYPE='B') AS B FROM DUAL
SELECT COUNT(*) AS WHOLE FROM ROOM WHERE ROOM_USEABLE=1 AND ROOM_TYPE=?

SELECT COUNT(*) RESV FROM ROOM LEFT JOIN (SELECT RESERVATION.*, SYSDATE AS RESERVATION_BET FROM RESERVATION) R ON(R.ROOM_NO=ROOM.ROOM_NO) LEFT JOIN PAYMENT ON(R.RESERVATION_NO=PAYMENT_RESERVATION_NO) WHERE PAYMENT_STATUS_CODE = 1 AND PAYMENT_CANCEL IS NULL AND ROOM.ROOM_TYPE=? AND ROOM.ROOM_USEABLE=1 AND RESERVATION_START_DATE <= SYSDATE AND RESERVATION_END_DATE >= SYSDATE
